edu.oakland.finaid.mvc.portlet

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.oakland.finaid.mvc.portlet.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Renders the main portlet view containing information about the user's financial aid term, requirements, academic progress, and awards.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 2012-08-30
    Author:
    Aaron Grant

      • setViewSelector

        public void setViewSelector(IViewSelector viewSelector)
        Sets the value of viewSelector in preparation to show the main view.
        Parameters:
        viewSelector - An IViewSelector which is used in determing whether to use the mobile or desktop theme.

      • showMainView

        public ModelAndView showMainView(RenderRequest request,
                        RenderResponse response)
        Returns both the Model and View inside of a single object which will then be displayed to the user. This view displays information contained in the models about the user's financial award and hold information, and his or her academic progress which is necessary in figuring out eligibility. The Term models are created which each contain a specific term and the corresponding Award, Holds, Progress, and FinancialInfo models. Finally, the terms, models, current term, and any advisor messages are added to the the ModelAndView and returned. If the logger is enabled, a log will be made of the results.
        Parameters:
        request - A RenderRequest that contains information about which theme is to be used
        response - A RenderResponse that contains information about how to further render the portlet
        Returns:
        A ModelAndView that holds the model and view to be used with this controller.

      • getProgress

        public Progress getProgress(java.lang.String term,
                   java.lang.String pidm)
        Queries the database for the user's academic progress.
        Parameters:
        term - A String which is used to specify the term from which to get the user's academic progress
        pidm - A String which uniquely identifies the user
        Returns:
        Information on the user's academic progress (used in determining financial aid eligibility)
